entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
